text:
<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Informational message: Increased Error Rates>
We are currently investigating increased delivery error rates for our email-sending APIs in the US-WEST-2 Region.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Informational message: Increased Error Rates>
We are seeing recovery in delivery rates for our email-sending APIs in the US-WEST-2 Region.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Service is operating normally: [RESOLVED] Increased Error Rates>
Earlier today we experienced elevated delivery failure rates for our email-sending APIs in the US-WEST-2 Region. The issue has been resolved and the service is operating normally.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Informational message: VPN Connectivity>
We are investigating connectivity issues for some VPN tunnels in the US-GOV-WEST-1 Region.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Informational message: VPN Connectivity>
We continue to work towards resolving the connectivity issue affecting some VPN tunnels in the US-GOV-WEST-1 Region.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Informational message: VPN Connectivity>
We continue to work on identifying root cause for the connectivity issues affecting some VPN tunnel in the US-GOV-WEST-1 Region. VPN tunnels may experience periods of recovery but connectivity is not yet stable. Since not all tunnels are affected by this issue, provisioning a new VPN tunnel may resolve the issue prior to full recovery.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Informational message: VPN Connectivity>
We have identified the root cause of the connectivity issue affecting some VPN tunnels in the US-GOV-WEST-1 Region and continue to work towards recovery. Since not all tunnels are affected by this issue, provisioning a new VPN tunnel may resolve the issue prior to full recovery.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Informational message: VPN Connectivity>
Some of the affected VPN tunnels are seeing periods of recovery as we continue to work towards resolving the connectivity issues affecting some VPN tunnels in the US-GOV-WEST-1 Region. Since not all tunnels are affected by this issue, provisioning a new VPN tunnel may resolve the issue prior to full recovery.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Informational message: VPN Connectivity>
We are seeing recovery for the majority of VPN tunnels experiencing connectivity issues in the US-GOV-WEST-1 Region.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Service is operating normally: [RESOLVED] VPN Connectivity>
We have restored connectivity for all affected VPN tunnels in the US-GOV-WEST-1 Region. The issue has been resolved and the service is operating normally.
